I work in the IT department at Fidelity National Financial as a System Administrator. I manage all aspects of the computer network, IT projects, security, VM servers, and VOIP phone systems.  Plan office expansions, roll out new software and manage training as well as the escrow managment system IMPACT.  I'm the go to for a paper jam all the way up to an entire network meltdown.  Also assist in moving entire data centers.  My FNF contact email is.  brian.deatherage@fnf.com

Brian Deatherage Sold ArizonaFPV to Mark Yori in March of 2017.Since 2011, Phoenix Drone Services LLC has been utilizing FPV (First Person View) technology to do aerial videography, photography and civil engineering like it has never been done before.  We have our FAA 333 exemption, The services we offer can take you places you‚Äôve never been or provide a new perspective on those you already love, a perspective that couldn‚Äôt be achieved even from a private charter plane or helicopter tour. Our mission is to provide you with the best aerial video and photography service on the planet. We tailor and customize each service to fulfill your aerial video and photography needs with a passion you will not find elsewhere. Phoenix Drone Services specializes in commercial properties, real estate video listings, community events, music videos, outdoor adventures, weddings, civil 3D mapping and endless special requests.

Brian Deatherage sold this company in March 2017 to then other partner Mark Yori.Phoenix Drone Service / ArizonaFPV, Phoenix Drone Services is the premier Arizona company to use for all your drone service needs. Videos, Photos, Editing, and 3D mapping are all services offered at Phoenix Drone Service. We are fully insured & have our FAA 333 Exemption.www.PhoenixDroneService.com

recommendations: Chris Fedo
Director of Video Production at FEDOCREATIVE
June 15, 2016, Chris was a client of Brian‚Äôs

My advertising agency works with Brian and his business partner, Mark, on the regular. We have worked with them on dozens of projects for web and TV and recommend them without hesitation.When we need aerial video, Phoenix Drone Service is our ONLY choice due to their professionalism; extensive knowledge of drone operation and law; and creative capabilities. When I tell my clients that I'm bringing an FAA 333 exempt drone operator to a shoot, they are impressed. I also love to brag about Brian and Mark being featured in national publications like HuffPo. Brian and Mark help make me look good :)From my perspective as a video producer, hiring Phoenix Drone Service means I can be confident that I've done my due diligence to ensure legal liabilities are at a minimum on shoot day. I also know that I'm going to get the highest quality footage because Mark and Brian are constantly investing in the latest equipment and focused on professional development. Best of all: they are easy to work with. You won't find a better, more reliable drone operator ... or nicer folks.

I found Brian on the internet. Phoenix Drone service immediately responded. We had a three mile new slurry pipeline to build. This build was a new route across the top of mountains and beside the Pinto Valley Copper mine pit. They over excelled in delivering a Cad viewable product and a 3-D amazing over view of the area. The topography came in at the ONE foot description./ Much better then the two foot that was requested. The team was professional highly organized and delivered an amazing product. I would recommend Phoenix Drone service to everyone needing any type of Drone work. "
